articles.title: Lionel Messi: Argentina star says football has changed ahead of World Cup
articles.description: Lionel Messi has given some fascinating thoughts on the modern game ahead of the Qatar World Cup
articles.content:
Lionel Messi is a footballer unlike any other.
Physically, the Argentine is not exactly an impressive specimen – unlike his eternal rival, Cristiano Ronaldo.

articles.title: Demichelis to leave Bayern, take over as River Plate coach
articles.description: Former Argentina defender Martin Demichelis will leave his role as coach of Bayern Munich's reserve team to take charge of his former side River, the German Bundesliga club said on Monday.
articles.content:
Nov 14 (Reuters) - Former Argentina defender Martin Demichelis will leave his role as coach of Bayern Munich's reserve team to take charge of his former side River, the German Bundesliga club said on Monday.

articles.title: Argentina rains will speed up stalled soy planting, analysts say
articles.description: By Maximilian HeathBUENOS AIRES, Nov 14 (Reuters) - Rains in Argentina's farm belt over the weekend will allow farmers to speed up the delayed planting of soybeans, analysts at the country's two major grain exchanges said on Monday, a boost for the world's top soy oil and meal exporter.Argentina's 2022/23 farming campaign has been hit by a severe lack of rainfall, stretching
